channel.title: Python on Afnan Alabdulwahab
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Afnan Alabdulwahab

item.title: Comparative Study of LLM Evaluation Frameworks (Deloitte-Anthropic Alliance)
item.description: A comprehensive analysis of evaluation frameworks for LLMs, focusing on bias detection, response quality, and robustness - conducted in collaboration with Deloitte's Anthropic Alliance.

item.title: Understanding DeepEval's Bias Evaluation Methodology
item.description: A deep dive into DeepEval's methodology for bias detection in LLM-generated text, covering opinion extraction, structured evaluation, and scoring.

item.title: Benchmarking GPU Matrix Operations Optimizations
item.description: Comprehensive benchmarking study of matrix transpose and multiplication optimizations across NVIDIA GPU architectures, analyzing performance characteristics and implementation strategies.

item.title: Detecting AI-Generated Text: Targeting Academic Integrity Applications
item.description: Developed a robust AI text detection model focused on minimizing false positives in academic writing using RoBERTa with parameter-efficient fine-tuning.

item.title: List of Irregular Verbs Across Romance Languages
item.description: This dataset contains all irregular verbs in known Romance languages.
